Title: Relates to a state pre-paid tuition plan
Summary: Establishes the New York state pre-paid tuition plan by which a person may contribute to an account for the pre-payment of college tuition, tax free.
LawCode: Add ยง355-f, Ed L; add ยง78-c, St Fin L; amd ยง5205, CPLR; amd ยง612, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, the state finance law, the civil practice law and rules and the tax law, in relation to establishing the New York state pre-paid tuition plan
